mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.doctor_code AS "sicmedUser.id", a.prescription_name AS "prescriptionName", a.prescription_name_ex AS "prescriptionNameEx", a.asked_code AS "askedClass.id", a.standerprescription_asked_code AS "standerprescriptionAsked.id", a.standerprescription_disease_code AS "standerprescriptionDisease.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN sicmed_user b ON b.id = a.doctor_code LEFT JOIN sicmed_standerprescription_asked c ON c.id = a.standerprescription_asked_code LEFT JOIN sicmed_standerprescription_disease d ON d.id = a.standerprescription_disease_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicmed_standardprescription_doctor( id, doctor_code, prescription_name, prescription_name_ex, asked_code, standerprescription_asked_code, standerprescription_disease_code, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sicmedUser.id}, #{prescriptionName}, #{prescriptionNameEx}, #{askedClass.id}, #{standerprescriptionAsked.id}, #{standerprescriptionDisease.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sicmed_standardprescription_doctor SET doctor_code = #{sicmedUser.id}, prescription_name = #{prescriptionName}, prescription_name_ex = #{prescriptionNameEx}, asked_code = #{askedClass.id}, standerprescription_asked_code = #{standerprescriptionAsked.id}, standerprescription_disease_code = #{standerprescriptionDisease.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
